trans-unit.source: Contains mutually exclusive <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" /> objects and <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualTransition" /> objects that are used to move from one state to another.
trans-unit.target: 包含互斥的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" /> 对象和用于从一种状态转移到另一种状态的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualTransition" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>包含一套<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> objects that specify how the control's appearance changes when the control is in a certain state.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>包含一套<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>指定控件的外观时该控件处于某个特定状态的更改的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> might have a slightly different appearance when it is pressed than when it is not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>时按下比不按下时可能遇到略有不同的外观。

trans-unit.source: Two states that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> defines correspond to when it is pressed (`"Pressed"`) and when it is not (`"Normal"`).
trans-unit.target: 两个状态<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>定义对应于按下它时 (`"Pressed"`) 并且它不是 (`"Normal"`)。

trans-unit.source: You add <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> to a control by setting the `VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups` attached property on the control.
trans-unit.target: 你添加<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>到通过设置控件`VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups`附加在控件上的属性。

trans-unit.source: You put states that are mutually exclusive to each other in the same <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 是互斥彼此中相同的状态放<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> has two <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>具有两个<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>对象。

trans-unit.source: One contains the states, `Normal`, `MouseOver`, `Pressed`, and `Disabled`.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含状态， `Normal`， `MouseOver`， `Pressed`，和`Disabled`。

trans-unit.source: The other contains the states, `Checked`, `UnChecked`, and `Indeterminate`.
trans-unit.target: 另一个包含状态， `Checked`， `UnChecked`，和`Indeterminate`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> can be in states `MouseOver` and `UnChecked` at the same time, but it cannot be in the `MouseOver` and `Pressed` states at the same time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>可能处于状态`MouseOver`和`UnChecked`在相同的时间，但不是能在`MouseOver`和`Pressed`在同一时间的状态。

trans-unit.source: Although you can add <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects to any element, they are a particularly useful way to enable others to redefine the visual behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 尽管您可以添加<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>指向任何元素的对象，它们是特别有用的方式，以使其他进行重新定义的可视行为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>。

trans-unit.source: If you create a custom control that uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, you can specify which states that control can be in by adding a <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> on its class definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建使用的自定义控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，你可以指定所处的状态控件，可通过添加具有<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute>上其类定义。

trans-unit.source: Then anyone who creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for your control can add <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects to the template.
trans-unit.target: 然后创建一个新的人<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>为您的控件可以添加<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>到模板的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> enables designer tools, such as Expression Blend, to expose the control's states.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute>使设计器工具，如 Expression Blend，公开控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: States with the same <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> belong in the same <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同的状态<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属于同一个<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to create controls that use the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md).
trans-unit.target: 对于详细了解如何创建控件使用<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>，请参阅[创建控件，其可自定义外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Transitions%2A> property contains <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> objects that are applied when the control transition between states that are defined in the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Transitions%2A>属性包含<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>中定义对象时控制转换的各状态之间应用<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a simple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that contains one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个简单<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，其中包含一个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>。

trans-unit.source: It also contains a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> named `CommonStates`, which defines the `MouseOver` and `Normal` states.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>名为`CommonStates`，后者定义了`MouseOver`和`Normal`状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> also has a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> that specifies that it takes one half second for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> to change from green to red when the user moves the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>还有<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>，它指定它采用半秒<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>更改从绿色到红色，当用户将鼠标指针移到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" /> that is currently applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前应用到该控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" /> that is currently applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 当前应用到该控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a control transitions to a different state.
trans-unit.target: 在控件转换为其他状态后发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the control transitions to a new state and the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在控件转换到新的状态后会发生此事件与<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanging>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control starts transitioning to a different state.
trans-unit.target: 在控件开始向其他状态转换时发生。

trans-unit.source: The event occurs when the control begins to transition states.
trans-unit.target: 当在控件开始转换状态，则事件发生。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> is applied to the state change, this event occurs when the transition begins.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>应用对状态更改，此事件转换开始时发生。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> is not applied, this event occurs after the control transitions to the new state, but before the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>未应用，会发生此事件后控件会转换为新的状态，但之前<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.CurrentStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Control authors specify which states the control can be in by adding a <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> on its class definition.
trans-unit.target: 控件作者指定所处的状态控件可以通过添加在<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute>上其类定义。

trans-unit.source: States with the same <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> belong in the same <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同的状态<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属于同一个<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>为的值<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> objects that are named `CommonStates` and `FocusStates`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建两个<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>命名的对象`CommonStates`和`FocusStates`。

trans-unit.source: The control will be in exactly one state from each <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> at all times.
trans-unit.target: 控件将处于从各个恰好一个状态<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>在所有时间。

trans-unit.source: For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of mutually exclusive <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取互斥 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of mutually exclusive <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 互斥 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a simple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that contains one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个简单<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，其中包含一个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>。

trans-unit.source: It also contains a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> named `CommonStates`, which defines the `MouseOver` and `Normal` states.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>名为`CommonStates`，后者定义了`MouseOver`和`Normal`状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> also has a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> that specifies that it takes one half second for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> to change from green to red when the user moves the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>还有<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>，它指定它采用半秒<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>更改从绿色到红色，当用户将鼠标指针移到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualTransition" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualTransition" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualTransition" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualTransition" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> objects in <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Transitions%2A> are applied when the control transition between states that are defined in the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Transitions%2A>中定义的各状态间的控件转换时，将应用<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a simple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that contains one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个简单<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，其中包含一个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>。

trans-unit.source: It also contains a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> named `CommonStates`, which defines the `MouseOver` and `Normal` states.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>名为`CommonStates`，后者定义了`MouseOver`和`Normal`状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> also has a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> that specifies that it takes one half second for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> to change from green to red when the user moves the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>还有<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>，它指定它采用半秒<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>更改从绿色到红色，当用户将鼠标指针移到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。
